Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals today, including our favorite Kindle, a top-notch steam mop and a variety of must-have beauty products, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. If you're looking for N95 and KN95 masks right now, Amazon also has plenty of choices on sale today, too.

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

Better still, right now, shoppers can receive a $5 discount off their first $10+ Amazon app purchase. 

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. Down $10: Our favorite steam mop 

Get a head start on spring cleaning by picking up the Bissell Power Fresh steam mop, down from $92.69 to $82.69 right now at Amazon. Ranking as one of our favorite steam mops, this powerful cleaning tool has three SmartSet power settings and a convenient 23-foot power cord. Better still, the mop can be ready to use in just 30 seconds and comes with several scrubbing pads so you can easily and quickly rid your floors of dirt and grime. Designed to leave your hardwoods and tiles sparkling, the brand claims this steam mop eliminates as much as 99.9% of germs and bacteria. 

Get the Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop for $82.69 (Save $10)

2. Save up to 30%: Must have hair and beauty products 

Stock your bathroom cabinets with new deodorant, body lotion and hair products by shopping markdowns on select beauty products at Amazon. For a limited time, you can save as much as 30% on items from Pantene, Olay, Old Spice, Secret, Herbal Essences and more. For refreshing your locks, one great pick is the Aussie Miracle Curls collection. Currently on sale for just $21.24—an impressive $13.75 markdown—this customer-favorite hair kit comes with shampoo, conditioner, deep conditioner, spray gel, detangling milk and oil hair treatment. 

Save up to 30% on select beauty products from Olay, Pantene and more

3. Save $30: Our favorite Kindle

The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite is our favorite Kindle and one of the best e-readers we've ever tested. Right now, you can pick up the 6.8-inch device and dive into all your favorite books for just $109.99 for the 8GB 11th Generation version—$30 off the full $139.99 list price and one of the lowest prices we've ever seen. With the Paperwhite, you can read thousands of titles, catch up on podcasts and even listen to audiobooks when you connect a Bluetooth audio device. In testing, we found the device had a large, crisp display and an impressive battery life—it's capable of running for up to 10 weeks on a single charge. 

Get the 8GB Amazon Kindle Paperwhite for $109.99 (Save $30)

4. Under $55: This Reviewed-approved water flosser 

Keeping your teeth sparkly clean is easy with the MySmile powerful cordless water dental flosser, down from $83.99 to as little as $50.39 for the white version when you click the on-page coupon. Ranking as one of our favorite oral irrigators, this water flosser features a 350-milliliter reservoir, a rotating nozzle and five cleaning modes to remove food residue and stains between your teeth. According to the brand, the dental device has a battery life of up to 20 days, making it convenient for travel, too. 

Get the MySmile Powerful Cordless Water Dental Flosser from $50.39 with on-page coupon (Save $30 to $33.60)

5. 58% off: This popular pet brush 

Keep your pet's fur silky smooth with the Hertzko self-cleaning slicker brush, down from $29.99 to just $12.70 right now—a whopping 58% price cut. An Amazon customer-favorite, this brush can be used on both dogs and cats to gently remove matted fur, tangles and dander. Made with retractable bristles for easy cleaning, the best-selling brush is designed to groom your pet's undercoat without scratching or irritating their skin.

Get the Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats for $12.70 (Save $17.29)

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. Apple AirPods Pro

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for under $180 right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $174.98—a $74.02 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $174.98 (Save $74.02)

2. Lement KN95 Face Masks 

Keep yourself and your family protected with the Lement KN95 face masks. Typically listed for $59.99, you can get a 50-pack of these 5-layer disposable masks for just $16.99 at Amazon—a whopping $43 markdown. The face masks feature an adjustable nose clip and soft elastic ear loops to provide a safe and comfortable fit. According to the brand, the masks are best suited for use in busy public places, and provide a 95% filter efficiency to keep you safe from airborne particles.

Get the Lement KN95 Face Mask 50-Pack for $16.99 (Save $43)

3. Hilife HL7 Steamer

Keep your fanciest clothes looking sharp with the Hilife HL7 steamer, on sale at Amazon today for just $25.49. Typically listed for $35.99, you can get the compact clothing steamer for 29% off right now. The HL7 is one of the best steamers we've ever tried thanks to a sleek design that features a wider base, a lid on top and an extended spout for steam. It also has a greater water capacity than other similar models and an attached lint comb that keeps you from touching your clothes directly with the hot steam head. 

Get the Hilife HL7 Steamer for $25.49 (Save $10.50)

4. Roborock S4 Max Robot Vacuum

If you're worried you keep missing a specific spot on the floor while cleaning your house, the Roborock S4 Max can make things easier. Normally priced at $429.99, this smart appliance is now 30% off, ringing up at $299.99 at Amazon. Roborock says the S4 Max uses LiDAR navigation technology to focus on precise locations in both bright and dark rooms. You also have the ability to program the device to avoid vacuuming and mopping up to 10 locations in four levels of your house.

Get the Roborock S4 Max Robot Vacuum for $299.99 (Save $130)

5. 23andMe Ancestry + Traits Service DNA Testing Kit

If you want to find out more about your roots this year, 23andMe, one of our favorite DNA testing kits, can help you connect. You can get one of the brand's testing kits with the added traits feature for just $79—a $20 price cut from its standard tag of $99. When we tested the combo kit, our tester enjoyed reading about what her DNA contained and found the information provided both "interesting and valuable." She said the Traits add-on was a fun way to find out what physical traits you could have—even if it didn't always hit the mark. 

Get the 23andMe Ancestry + Traits Service DNA Testing Kit for $79 (Save $20)
